hero.title: Where performance meets well-being
hero.description: A platform for youth teams that puts mental health, motivation, and team management in one place.

mission.label: OUR MISSION
mission.title: Why NordicPro?
mission.subtitle: Talent is not the problem – lack of support is.
whyParagraphs: Many children struggle alone, feel left out, or lack support at home. Far too many leave sports too early – not because they lack the will, but because they lack the support.
With simple check-ins, coaches, leaders, and parents gain early insights into how the kids are doing – so they can step in before it’s too late.
We want more children to feel well, grow, and stay in sports for longer.

features.title: Drive motivation
features.description: Gamified goals, team challenges, and feedback that keeps players engaged and driven.

features.title: Mental health
features.description: Quick check-ins, reflection prompts, and access to help — because well-being fuels long-term success.

features.title: Team Management
features.description: Scheduling, communication, and team management shouldn't be complicated. Now it's not.

features.title: Built for retention
features.description: When players feel connected, they stay. We help clubs keep their talent season after season.

features.label: FEATURES
features.title: Everything you're already doing — just better
features.subtitle: All-in-one platform for athlete well-being, motivation, and team management.

items.description: Track attendance, behavior, and engagement — all in one view.
Oversee all teams, coaches, and aggregated wellness data from a central dashboard.
Get actionable data on player development and team dynamics.
Send messages to players, parents, or staff with built-in safety controls.
Set trainings, matches, and reminders with calendar integration.
Offer transparency on attendance, feedback, and player wellbeing — GDPR-compliant.
Celebrate performance, attitude, and attendance through gamified awards.
Weekly coach feedback using simple structured prompts.
Players unlock badges and monitor growth in performance and behavior.
Detect early signs of distress with weekly check-ins and coach alerts.
Visualize player and team wellbeing over time, co-developed with psychologists.
Three-stage model: awareness, coach engagement, and professional escalation.

appShowcase.subtitle: Get a glimpse of our innovative platform designed to transform youth sports teams.

partnership.subtitle: Let's team up.

platform.title: All-in-one platform for athlete well-being
description: NordicPro combines mental health support, motivation tools, and team management features in one seamless platform designed specifically for youth sports.
Our approach focuses on the whole athlete - supporting their mental well-being while providing the tools coaches need to build stronger, more resilient teams.

stats.label: Of coaches report improved team dynamics

cta.title: Ready to transform your team's experience?
cta.description: Join the waitlist today and be among the first to experience NordicPro when we launch.

questions.question: What is NordicPro?
questions.answer: NordicPro is an all-in-one platform designed specifically for youth sports teams that combines mental health support, motivation tools, and team management features. We help coaches build stronger, more resilient teams while supporting the well-being of young athletes.

questions.question: Who should use NordicPro?
questions.answer: NordicPro is ideal for youth sports clubs, coaches, and organizations that want to improve player retention, team dynamics, and overall athlete well-being. Our platform is designed for soccer teams but can be adapted for various youth sports.

questions.question: Can it replace our current team tools?
questions.answer: Yes! NordicPro is designed to be a comprehensive solution that can replace multiple tools you might currently be using. It includes scheduling, communication, payment tracking, and attendance features, along with our unique mental health and motivation tools.

questions.question: When will NordicPro be available?
questions.answer: We're currently onboarding early partners. Join the waitlist to be the first to know when we launch in your region.

contact.text: If you have more questions, please call us or get in touch with us!

ui.newsletterText: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates.
ui.aboutShort: A platform for youth teams that puts mental health, motivation, and team management in one place.

cookies.title: We use cookies to improve your experience.
cookies.description: You can manage your cookie preferences anytime.
cookies.metaDescription: Learn about how NordicPro uses cookies and how you can manage your preferences.
cookies.pageDescription: This Cookie Policy explains how NordicPro uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website.

essential.title: Essential
essential.description: Required for the website to function properly.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Help us improve our website by collecting anonymous data.

cookieCategories.name: Essential Cookies
cookieCategories.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems.

cookies.purpose: Maintains your session while you browse our website

cookieCategories.name: Analytics Cookies

cookies.purpose: Used to distinguish users in Google Analytics

cookies.name: _gid
cookies.purpose: Used to distinguish users in Google Analytics

howToManage.title: How to Manage Cookies
howToManage.description: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings preferences. However, if you limit the ability of websites to set cookies, you may worsen your overall user experience.

terms.metaDescription: Read the terms and conditions for using NordicPro's platform and services.
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our platform.
terms.contactInfo: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at legal@nordicpro.com

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
content: By accessing or using NordicPro's platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, and such modifications shall be effective immediately upon posting of the modified terms. Your continued use of the platform after any modifications indicates your acceptance of the modified terms.

sections.title: 2. Use License
content: Permission is granted to temporarily use the platform for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
- modify or copy the materials;
- use the materials for any commercial purpose;
- attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on NordicPro's platform;
- remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials; or
- transfer the materials to another person or 'mirror' the materials on any other server.

sections.title: 3. User Accounts
content: To access certain features of the platform, you may be required to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information, including your password, and for all activity that occurs under your account.

You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security. We will not be liable for any loss that you may incur as a result of someone else using your password or account, either with or without your knowledge.

sections.title: 4. Privacy Policy
content: Your use of NordicPro's platform is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs the platform and informs users of our data collection practices.
By using our platform, you consent to our collection and use of your information as described in the Privacy Policy.

sections.title: 5. Disclaimer
content: The materials on NordicPro's platform are provided on an 'as is' basis. NordicPro makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

Further, NordicPro does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its platform or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site.

sections.title: 6. Limitations
content: In no event shall NordicPro or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on NordicPro's platform, even if NordicPro or a NordicPro authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.

privacy.metaDescription: Learn about how NordicPro collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information.
privacy.contactInfo: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@nordicpro.com

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
content: We collect several types of information from and about users of our platform, including:
- Personal information such as name, email address, and phone number when you register for an account
- Usage data about how you interact with our platform
- Device information including your IP address, browser type, and operating system
- Location data if you grant us permission to access your device's location

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
content: We use the information we collect about you for various purposes, including to:
- Provide, maintain, and improve our platform
- Process and complete transactions
- Send you technical notices, updates, and support messages
- Respond to your comments, questions, and requests
- Monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities in connection with our platform
- Detect, investigate, and prevent fraudulent transactions and other illegal activities

sections.title: 3. Sharing of Your Information
content: We may share your personal information with:
- Service providers who perform services on our behalf
- Partners with whom we offer co-branded services or products
- Law enforcement or other governmental officials, if required by law
We will not sell your personal information to third parties.

sections.title: 4. Data Security
content: We have implemented measures designed to secure your personal information from accidental loss and from unauthorized access, use, alteration, and disclosure.

Unfortunately, the transmission of information via the internet is not completely secure. Although we do our best to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee the security of your personal information transmitted to our platform.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights
content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, such as:
- The right to access and receive a copy of your personal information
- The right to rectify or update your personal information
- The right to delete your personal information
- The right to restrict or object to our processing of your personal information
To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided at the end of this policy.

sections.title: 6. Children's Privacy
content: Our platform is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe we may have collected information about a child, please contact us.

waitlist.title: Join the NordicPro Waitlist
waitlist.description: Are you a club, coach, or team interested in improving player wellbeing, motivation, and retention? Sign up to get early access to NordicPro and help shape the platform through real-world feedback.
waitlist.subtitle: Why Join the Waitlist
benefits: Give feedback that shapes the platform
Get discounted pricing as an early adopter
Be recognized as a pioneer club or team

partners.title: Partner With NordicPro
partners.description: We're looking to collaborate with mental health organizations, sponsors, researchers, and community leaders who share our mission to improve youth athlete wellbeing through innovation and impact.
partners.subtitle: Why Collaborate With Us
benefits: Contribute to building tools that support mental health in sports
Collaborate on youth-focused content and early detection systems
Sponsor access for underserved clubs and teams
Gain visibility and impact reports for your organization
Be part of long-term strategy and innovation workshops
Be recognized as a founding partner in our mission
